thread.title: Jeremy McConnell 'likes' racy lingerie pic of Stephanie Davis on Instagram
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell 'likes' racy lingerie pic of Stephanie Davis on Instagram

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Jeremy McConnell 'likes' racy lingerie pic of Stephanie Davis on Instagram
text:
Jeremy McConnell 'likes' racy lingerie pic of Stephanie Davis on Instagram Are they or aren't they? The troubled former couple's apparent love-fest continues to keep everyone guessing Share Jeremy McConnell has liked one of Stephanie Davis' Instagrams. Woo! Share Get   
Jeremy McConnell seems to be getting things back on track with Stephanie Davis - after liking a racy snap she shared on Instagram. 
Steph posted the throwback pic of her in lingerie to her account, documenting her plans to get back into shape after the birth of her new baby. 
"I think we take our bodies for granted," she wrote. "I never would have looked in the mirror before having my little boy and realised just what mine could produce. A pure miracle. Jeremy and Steph have had a turbulent relationship since meeting on Celebrity Big Brother last year (Photo: ITV) Jeremy and Steph in much happier times (Photo: Stephanie Davis/Twitter) Caben-Albi, shortly after he was born last month (Photo: Instagram/stephaniedavis88) 
"Even though I'm so proud of what my body created, I must admit I've been missing what it was before... I'm really looking forward to working on getting as much of my pre baby body back as possible in a safe and healthy way." 
And Jeremy clicked like on the post. What does it all mean? 
The pair - who are parents to five week old Caben-Albi - have been spotted out and about in Liverpool in the past week, despite numerous spectacular falling outs and tiffs throughout 2016. 
Steph and Jeremy went for a stroll with their son at the weekend, and a few days later were spotted laughing as they bizarrely left a dentist's surgery through a sandwich shop . Stephanie and Jeremy seem to have put their differences behind them Jeremy shared a cute snap of his son, Caben-Albi (Photo: stephdavis77/Twitter) Read More Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation 
Fans told Mirror Online it was obvious the pair were an item again, as they were seen laughing and giggling with each other. They said: "Jeremy looked healthier than ever and Steph couldn't hide her grin." 
The proud new dad turned 27 on Wednesday , and revealed he's having the best birthday ever - could it be down to fatherhood? 
"Woken up to the best birthday Iv ever had," he shared, alongside a string of rosy-cheeked smiling emojis. 
One week ago, he shared a picture of Caben-Albi on Instagram, writing: "Happiest man alive , my new focus".
